structured_metadata.og_description: We believe our research will eventually lead to artificial general intelligence, a system that can solve human-level problems. Building safe and beneficial AGI is our mission.
structured_metadata.og_image:alt: Two people sitting in a sun-filled meeting room with planters and large windows, one person talking while the other listens and looks on
